title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 1 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! This is our last Monday of 2024. Wow! How was your weekend? My boys were away and I spent the whole weekend in hermit mode hibernating, cleaning, and watching old Steve Martin movies while I reconciled the past year in my Currently Workbook. I am at square one with laundry (YAY) and did a late-night meal prep. My fridge was looking real ROUGH inside. Hooray for order. I also went for a walk and hosted Self-Check-In yesterday to map out my Intentions for the Week.  This week I will work on my Intentions for the Year so I can co-host this workshop! Intention Setting Online Workshop 2025 Saturday, January 11 10 AM-12 PM  2025, let’s go! I wish you ease this week. Take things one step at a time. XO Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day new years rituals go into a body of water work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope open forum The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life December 2024 tracy’s tracking tools  hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop packing list laundry  litterboxes water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs put sheets on the bed pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work in Currently workbook (December spread) check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope movie night on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life newsletter draft hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit prep for Xmas eve celebrate Christmas wrap presents laundry  litterboxes water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire: Favorite Productivity Tools  Winter Fruit & Vegetable Recipes How to Start the New Year Off Right Goodbye/Hello List Printable!  Creating a Workout Routine Everyday Magic My Weightloss Journey Favorite Trader Joe’s Beauty Products   If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood:   Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!  You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!    The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list/planner started by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean.com & The Handwriting Club!

html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 1 in 2025

Hi hiiiiii! This is our last Monday of 2024. Wow! How was your weekend? My boys were away and I spent the whole weekend in hermit mode hibernating, cleaning, and watching old Steve Martin movies while I reconciled the past year in my Currently Workbook.  I am at square one with laundry (YAY) and did a late-night meal prep. My fridge was looking real ROUGH inside. Hooray for order.  I also went for a walk and hosted Self-Check-In yesterday to map out my Intentions for the Week. 

This week I will work on my Intentions for the Year so I can co-host this workshop!

Intention Setting Online Workshop 2025

Saturday, January 11

10 AM-12 PM 

2025, let’s go!

I wish you ease this week. Take things one step at a time. XO

Here are my Intentions for the Week! 

Intentions this Week 

This week’s intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • workout every day
  • new years rituals
  • go into a body of water
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • open forum The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • December 2024
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • hope circuit check in
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • packing list
  • laundry 
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • put sheets on the bed
  • pickup the deck
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Last Week’s Intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • workout every day
  • work in Currently workbook (December spread)
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • movie night on The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • eating meeting
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • newsletter draft
  • hope circuit check in
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • meal prep/make video
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • declutter shit
  • prep for Xmas eve
  • celebrate Christmas
  • wrap presents
  • laundry 
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • wash dish towels
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean bathrooms
  • pickup the deck
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Posts to Inspire:

Favorite Productivity Tools 

Winter Fruit & Vegetable Recipes

How to Start the New Year Off Right

Goodbye/Hello List Printable! 

Creating a Workout Routine

Everyday Magic

My Weightloss Journey

Favorite Trader Joe’s Beauty Products

If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! 

Here’s a mood:

Mantra for the week!

Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. 

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year!

I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. 

It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! 

Need extra help? Join my accountability group:

SELF-CHECK-IN

We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. 

Those are my Intentions for the Week! 

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
